resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104471</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104471</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212166</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Soil Horizons</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Boden-Horizonte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Horizons de Sol</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Horizontes Do Solo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orizzonti Del Terreno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδαφολογικοί ορίζοντες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Horizontes Del Suelo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site features Flash animations that illustrate the development of soil horizons and their characteristics. Animations depict the processes of eluviation and illuviation, soil thickness and biomantle development, and a typical progression of soil profile development from bedrock to mature soil. These visual resources may be suitable for integration into lectures, labs and other teaching activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Situationsmerkmale blinken Animationen, die
die Entwicklung der Bodenhorizonte und ihrer Eigenschaften 
veranschaulichen. Animationen stellen die Prozesse von 
eluviation und illuviation, Bodenstärke und biomantle Entwicklung und
eine typische Weiterentwicklung der Bodenprofilentwicklung vom 
Grundgestein bildlich dar, um Boden zu reifen. Diese 
Sichtbetriebsmittel können für Integration in Vorträge, in Labors 
und in andere unterrichtende Aktivitäten verwendbar sein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les dispositifs de ce site flashent les animations
qui illustrent le développement des horizons de sol et de leurs 
caractéristiques. Les animations dépeignent les processus de 
l'eluviation et l'illuviation, épaisseur de sol et développement de 
biomantle, et une progression typique du développement de profil de 
sol de la roche en place pour mûrir le sol. Ces ressources 
visuelles peuvent convenir à l'intégration dans des conférences, 
des laboratoires et d'autres activités d'enseignement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As características deste local piscam os 
animations que ilustram o desenvolvimento de horizontes do solo e de 
suas características. Os animations descrevem os processos do 
eluviation e o illuviation, espessura do solo e desenvolvimento do 
biomantle, e uma progressão típica do desenvolvimento do perfil do 
solo do bedrock para amadurecer o solo. Estes recursos visuais 
podem ser apropriados para a integração em lectures, em 
laboratórios e em outras atividades ensinando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Caratteristiche di questo luogo espongono a flash 
animazioni che illustrano lo sviluppo degli orizzonti del terreno e 
delle loro caratteristiche. Le animazioni descrivono i processi 
del eluviation ed illuviation, spessore del terreno e sviluppo del 
biomantle e una progressione tipica di sviluppo di profilo del terreno
da roccia fresca per fare maturare il terreno. Queste risorse 
visive possono essere adatte ad integrazione nelle conferenze, nei 
laboratori ed in altre attività d'istruzione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή χαρακτηρίζει τις ζωτικότητες λάμψης 
που επεξηγούν την ανάπτυξη των εδαφολογικών οριζόντων και των 
χαρακτηριστικών τους. Οι ζωτικότητες απεικονίζουν τις 
διαδικασίες του eluviation και του illuviation, το εδαφολογική
πάχος και biomantle την ανάπτυξη, και μια χαρακτηριστική πρόοδο
της ανάπτυξης εδαφοτομής από στρώμα βράχου για να ωριμάσουν το 
χώμα. Αυτά τα οπτικά στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς μπορούν να 
είναι κατάλληλα για την ένταξη στις διαλέξεις, τα εργαστήρια και 
άλλες δραστηριότητες διδασκαλίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las características de este sitio contellean las 
animaciones que ilustran el desarrollo de los horizontes del suelo y 
de sus características. Las animaciones representan los 
procesos del eluviation e illuviation, espesor del suelo y desarrollo 
del biomantle, y una progresión típica del desarrollo del perfil del
suelo de la roca de fondo para madurar el suelo. Estos recursos 
visuales pueden ser convenientes para la integración en conferencias,
laboratorios y otras actividades de enseñanza.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212166</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104471</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/soil-horizons</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
